function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High exposure to global trade and GVC-integration leading to vulnerability to contagious diseases propagation.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and spread due to high connectivity to international markets.","Mitigation":"Implement strict border controls, quarantine measures, and international collaboration for disease surveillance and control.","Technologies":"Advanced disease surveillance systems, rapid testing technologies, and digital contact tracing tools.","People":"Populations of highly open and GVC-integrated economies.","Owner":"Government authorities, healthcare organizations, and international health agencies."},{"Description":"Trade-off between efficiency and exposure to shocks in GVCs for certain countries.","Impact":"Limited incentives for re-localization despite high vulnerability to shocks and disease outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Diversification of supply chains, investment in domestic production capacity, and development of contingency plans for disease-related disruptions.","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, automation and robotics for domestic production, and predictive modeling for risk assessment.","People":"Policy makers, economic planners, and business leaders in GVC-dependent countries.","Owner":"Government authorities, industry associations, and multinational corporations."}]}
